name: T500 Smart Watch
cmnt: Baby likes it. It's thicker than I thought. Baby likes chewing the green stem part more than the tip though. Overall a quite good one.

name: FOREVIGO SW-300
cmnt: Esta muy padre, pero si se me hace un poco caro a comparación de otras morderás de la misma marca

name: IDR1275313
cmnt: Tiene buen tamaño, buen color, una sola pieza. Solo que a mi bebé no me gustó, jajajaja! Pensé que le sería atractiva, pero no. En realidad no le gusta ninguna mordedera. XD

name: Haylou Solar LS05-1
cmnt: It’s the perfect size for a baby to hold and grab I in love with it! For the price is a great deal!

name: Titan Smart Pro
cmnt: My son has his two first teeth coming in. We have not been able to find much relief with other teethers. This one seems to being the trick.

name: Padgene Watch M-2
cmnt: Great Services! Wanna Buy again and again. Thouh its my first time but i highly recommened this seller

name: JPY6315
cmnt: My kid took to this immediately! He's 10 months and has two lower and two upper front teeth, with more on the way. Easy for him to grip and manipulate (can move to sides of mouth) and has bumpy yet soft edges for him to chew on.
